member.name: M:FastScript.BitVector.Create(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create BitArray with at least the specified number of bits.

member.name: M:FastScript.BitVector.AllSet(System.Int32)
member.summary: return a bit array with all bits set from index 0 through bitCount-1

member.name: M:FastScript.BitVector.Clone
member.summary: Make a copy of a bit array.

member.name: M:FastScript.BitVector.IntersectWith(FastScript.BitVector@)
member.summary: Modify this bit vector by bitwise AND-ing each element with the other bit vector. Return true if any changes were made to the bits of this bit vector.
